Translations.Text: Sapata tura parbatara
sapata kitabara yito lipibad'dha ache
unmukta patata
Sapata abada grhara
sapata su'ucca cadara
sapata taranga-biksubdha uttala sagarara
niscaya tomara pratipalakara sasti arasyambharai
iyara pratiraodhakarai kono na'i
Yidina prabalabharae akasakhana prakampita ha’ba
arau parbatasamuha drautagatita paraibhramana karaiba
eteke sarbanasa se'idina asbikarakaraisakalara babe
yihamte khela-dhemalira chalanarae asara karmata lipta thake
Se'idina sihamtaka jahannamara ju'ira phale theli-heci lai yoraa ha’ba
‘e'itorae se'i jahannama yaka tomaloke asbikara karaichila’
E'ito yadu neki? Ne tomaloke dekha noporaa
Tomaloke ju'ita praraesa karaa, tara pichata tomaloke dhairya dharana karaa ba nakaraa ubhaye'i tomalokara babe samana. Tomaloke yi karaichila tarae'i pratiphala tomalokaka diya haiche
Niscaya muttakbisakala thakiba jannatata arau praacuryara bhitarata
te'omlokara pratipalake te'omlokaka yi pradana karaiche seya te'omloke upabhoga karaiba arau te'omlokara pratipalake te'omlokaka raksa karaiba jbalanta agnira sastira paraa
‘tomaloke yi amala karaichila tara binimayata tomaloke trpti sahakarae khoraa arau pana karaa’
Te'omloke sraenibad'dhabharae susajjita asanata a'uji bahiba; arau ami te'omlokara milana ghatama mrganayani danara caku bisista hurara lagata

arau yisakale imana aniche arau te'omlokara santana-santati'o imanata te'omlokara anugami haiche, ami te'omlokara lagata te'omlokara santana-santatika ekatraita karaima, arau te'omlokara karmaphala ami alapo hraasa nakaraima; pratyeka byaktiye'i nija krtakarmara babe dayi
Arau ami te'omlokaka atiraikta pradana karaima phala-mula arau mansa yito te'omloke kamana karaiba
Tata te'omloke parasparae panapatra adana-pradana karaiba, tata kono nirarthaka katha-bataraa nathakiba arau kono papa kama'o nathakiba
Arau tata te'omlokara seraata carai'ophale ghurai thakiba kisorasakalara dala; sihamta dekhata yena suraksita mukuta
Arau te'omloke ijane sijanara phale ca'i sudhiba
te'omloke ka’ba, ‘niscaya ami iti purbe amara paraiyala bargara majata sankita arasthata achilo’
Tara pichata allahe amara prati anugraha karaiche arau amaka ju'ira sastira paraa raksa karaiche
Niscaya ami agate'o te'omke'i ahbana karaichilo; niscaya te'om krpamaya, parama dayalu
Eteke tumi upadesa di thaka, karana tomara pratipalakara anugrahata tumi ganako nahaya arau unmado nahaya
Sihamte kaya neki ye, e'om (muham'mada) ejana kabi? Ami tara mrtyura pratiksa karaicho
Koraa, ‘tomaloke apeksa karaa, mayo tomalokara lagata pratiksakaraisakalara antarbhukta ha’lo’
Sihamtara bibeka-bud'dhiye sihamtaka e'i adesa diye neki? Ne sihamta simalanghanakarai sampradaya
ne sihamte kaya, ‘e'i kora'ana e'om nije'i racana karaiche’? Baram sihamta imana naniba
Tente sihamte yadi satyabadi, tetiyaha’le sihamte iyara darae kono bani lai ahakacona
sihamte srastabihina srsti haiche neki, ne sihamta nije'i srasta
ne sihamte akasamandala arau prthirai srsti karaiche? Baram sihamte drrha bisbasa nakarae
Tomara pratipalakara gopana bhandara sihamtara ocarate neki, ne sihamte'i sakalo bastura niyantranakarai
ne sihamtara ocarata mai ache, ya’ta araohana karai sihamte (urd'dhajagatara katha) sunibalai paya? Tente sihamte suna se'i spasta pramanato lai ahakacona
ne kan'ya santana te'omra babe; arau putra santana tomalokara babe
tumi sihamtara ocarata pratidana bicaraa neki ye, sihamte iyaka eta durbaha boja buli bhabe
ne sihamtara ocarata adrsyara jnana ache, yito sihamte likhe
ne sihamte kono sarayantra karaiba bicarae? Eteke yihamte kupharai karae sihamte'i ha’ba sarayantrara cikara
Ne allahara bahirae sihamtara kono ilaha ache? Sihamte yi sbirka karae tara paraa allaha paraitra
Arau akasara kono tukuraa bhani paraa dekhile'o sihamte ka’ba, ‘e'ito eta punjibhuta megha’
Eteke sihamtaka erai diya se'idina paryanta, yidina sihamta bajraaghatata akraanta ha’ba
Se'idina sihamtara sarayantra kono kamata nahiba arau sihamtaka sahaya'o karaa naha’ba
Arau niscaya yihamte an'yaya karaiche sihamtara babe ache iyara bahirae'o arau sasti. Kintu sihamtara adhikansa'i e'i katha najane

Arau tumi tomara pratipalakara sid'dhantara oparata dhairya dharana karaa; karana tumi amara cukura sanmukhate acha. Tumi tomara pratipalakara prasansara saite paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaa yetiya tumi thiya horaa
Arau te'omra paraitrata ghosana karaa nisara bhagata arau taraabora astamita horaara pichata
